publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1201# Linda Fabiani: Local Television-That the Parliament congratulates Thistle Television, the only local television station in Scotland, on commencing local television broadcasting throughout Lanarkshire with a potential audience of 400,000 local people; welcomes Thistle Television as a valuable addition to local media networks and creative employment, and looks forward to its contribution to local business, culture, education, and community involvement.
S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) John Swinburne*

S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) Brian Adam*, Robert Brown*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Bruce Crawford*, Tommy Sheridan*, Michael McMahon*, Robin Harper*

S2M-1201# Linda Fabiani: Local Television-That the Parliament congratulates Thistle Television, the only local television station in Scotland, on commencing local television broadcasting throughout Lanarkshire with a potential audience of 400,000 local people; welcomes Thistle Television as a valuable addition to local media networks and creative employment, and looks forward to its contribution to local business, culture, education, and community involvement. Supported by: John Swinburne, Brian Adam, Robert Brown, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Jamie Stone, Roseanna Cunningham, Alex Neil, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Michael McMahon, Robin Harper, Margaret Mitchell*, Chris Ballance*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) Shiona Baird*, Jim Mather*, Patrick Harvie*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Karen Gillon*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Carolyn Leckie*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1201# Local Television (lodged on 26 April 2004) Frances Curran*

S2M-1201# Linda Fabiani: Local Television-That the Parliament congratulates Thistle Television, the only local television station in Scotland, on commencing local television broadcasting throughout Lanarkshire with a potential audience of 400,000 local people; welcomes Thistle Television as a valuable addition to local media networks and creative employment, and looks forward to its contribution to local business, culture, education, and community involvement. Supported by: John Swinburne, Brian Adam, Robert Brown, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Jamie Stone, Roseanna Cunningham, Alex Neil, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Michael McMahon, Robin Harper, Margaret Mitchell, Chris Ballance, Elaine Smith, Shiona Baird, Jim Mather, Patrick Harvie, Richard Lochhead, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Karen Gillon, Eleanor Scott, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Carolyn Leckie, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Mr Adam Ingram, Frances Curran
